description: React component AdminGate that conditionally renders children based on admin authorization status, using an authentication store hook.

methods.name: AdminGate({ children, fallback = null })
methods.description: Functional React component that renders its children if the user is an admin, otherwise shows a 'Not authorized' message or fallback.

ctags.name: AdminGate
ctags.pattern: /^export default function AdminGate({ children, fallback = null }) {$/
